title: "Why didn't you auto attack him, you're an ADC" playing AP Kog'Maw
body:
Team gets mad because I exit the teamfight with full health, saying I did nothing. Ashe wanders out to unwarded territory for some unknown reason and dies.

Apparently this and everything else that happens is all my fault. If I go solo in team builder nobody accepts me, if I start my own team builder party I have to wait 15 minutes because everyone leaves when they see me mid. "LOL AP kog has no damage".

Just a typical day as AP Kog'Maw. 

http://imgur.com/1tLDKW1
